formula.name: 4th Real Quasi Perpendicular
formula.reference: Xrn = Xr2 * Xr2 + Xi2 * Xi2 - 6 * Xr2 * Xi2 + Cr; Xin = Ci - 4 * Xi * abs(Xr * Xr2 - Xr * Xi2);
formula.perturbation: xrn = 4 * Xr2 * Xr * xr + 6 * Xr2 * xr2 + 4 * Xr * xr2 * xr + xr2 * xr2 + 4 * Xi2 * Xi * xi + 6 * Xi2 * xi2 + 4 * Xi * xi2 * xi + xi2 * xi2 - 12 * Xr2 * Xi * xi - 6 * Xr2 * xi2 - 12 * Xr * xr * Xi2 - 24 * Xr * xr * Xi * xi - 12 * Xr * xr * xi2 - 6 * xr2 * Xi2 - 12 * xr2 * Xi * xi - 6 * xr2 * xi2 + cr; xin = ( - 4) * Xi * diffabs(Xr2 * Xr - Xr * Xi2, - xr * Xi2 - 2 * xi * Xr * Xi - 2 * xr * xi * Xi + 3 * xr * Xr2 - xi2 * Xr + 3 * xr2 * Xr - xr * xi2 + xr2 * xr) - 4 * xi * abs( - Xr * Xi2 - xr * Xi2 - 2 * xi * Xr * Xi - 2 * xr * xi * Xi + Xr2 * Xr + 3 * xr * Xr2 - xi2 * Xr + 3 * xr2 * Xr - xr * xi2 + xr2 * xr) + ci;
